item.title: Getting started with Data Science
item.description: Knowing SQL, R/Python, Excel & Powerpoint will get the data science engine started Data scientist is the sexiest job of 21st century. Below given are some tools that a newbie in data science should get familiar with: Excel - Canâ€™t stress enough, but this is a must and should! SQL, R, Python - R (or) Python should suffice. It never hurts to have both in pocket. Power point, Tableau, Power BI Sublime text editor, Dropbox paper Databases & Websites are crucial sources of data Almost all the companies, small and big, keep their data in databases.
